body.p:
Lebanon Ky May 3. 1862
Hon. B. Magoffin.
Dear Sir=

I once held a Commission from your Hon. Predecessor. as Notary Public and found it exceedingly conveneince in our practice=taking affidavits to ansrs -- & other pleadings -- we are often inconvincienced here for want of some one to administer oaths. For these reasons I respectfully request a Commission to myself. as Notary Public=This will very much oblige your old friend

Marion Co
Notary
Thos. C. Woods
Com Issd May 4. 1862
